mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 2179) for an order placed by Walter Fuller for 3 orders of 1,000 8.5 x 11' Heralds that read Hi There, Sorry, and Fan Club President and 2,000 letterheads that read The Four Fuller Brothers. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
